name: Werewolf House - Fur-Person Shooter
description:
A WHOLE NEW DIMENSION OF FEAR

Don't really know what that means but it's actually true. Werewolf House is back and it's 3D now.

Make your way through rhythmic horror challenges on your way to the hottest, hairiest ticket in town: A party at the werewolf house. 

YOU CAN ALSO PLAY ON MOBILE!
I mean will it look weird and will there be glitches where it randomly resets? Sure. But that's part of the fun of gaming on the go. Works much better in landscape mode.

Disclaimer: The game has been coded perfectly to be fun and funny so if there's a problem with it, your computer probably has a virus. Or even worse, is haunted.

Visit AndyKneis.com for more stuff.
